api_management_name.description: The name of the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

approval_required.description: Do subscribers need to be approved prior to being able to use the Product?
approval_required.notes: `approval_required` can only be set when `subscription_required` is set to `true`.

display_name.description: The Display Name for this API Management Product.

product_id.description: The Identifier for this Product, which must be unique within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service should be exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subscription_required.description: Is a Subscription required to access API's included in this Product?

description.description: A description of this Product, which may include HTML formatting tags.

subscriptions_limit.description: The number of subscriptions a user can have to this Product at the same time.
subscriptions_limit.notes: `subscriptions_limit` can only be set when `subscription_required` is set to `true`.

terms.description: The Terms and Conditions for this Product, which must be accepted by Developers before they can begin the Subscription process.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Product.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Product.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Product.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Product.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Product.
